message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000. I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the value you've placed on the product.
Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but the $1,100,000 price point doesn't reflect the true value of this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway â€“ how about $1,200,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to go up to $1,150,000, but no higher. Can you consider this offer?
